StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: STAMPEED: Genome Wide Association for Asthma and Lung Function

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: We acknowledge the NHLBI STAMPEED RO1 and the SARP and CSGA NHLBI asthma programs.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Summary of GWAS results are included and may be used for other genetic studies. The informed consent document signed by the Study Participants allows use of these data results by investigators employed by non-profit and for-profit organizations. These data results may be used by private companies in the development of diagnostics and therapeutics under the current consent. This consent group does not require IRB approval.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
